items.sentence: Tom is upset because he didn\'t get the raise he\'d been promised.
It didn\'t take Tom long to realize that he wasn\'t welcome there.
It hasn\'t been easy for Tom to deal with Mary\'s health problems.
Before Tom became famous, he was a junior high school art teacher.
It was lucky I was able to speak to Tom before he left for Boston.
Keep your eyes wide open before marriage and half shut afterwards.
Kissing a man without a mustache is like eating eggs without salt.
Tom drove his family to the beach and they spent all day swimming.
Daddy, I can\'t walk any more. Could you give me a piggyback ride?
I\'ve already told my parents that I want a flute for my birthday.
I\'ve been drunk before and likely will get drunk many more times.
If you didn\'t get enough sleep last night, you should take a nap.
Tom couldn\'t rule out the possibility that Mary didn\'t like him.
Tom wouldn\'t have sung if I hadn\'t volunteered to sing with him.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all live in the same apartment building.
With some books, the more I read them, the less I understand them.
You should spend what little time you have left with your friends.
Both Tom and Mary said that they weren\'t studying French anymore.
I called the police and they said they\'d send someone right over.
I had a feeling that Tom wasn\'t going to be able to find his dog.
If you really need a job, why don\'t you consider working for Tom?
Tom realized he barely had enough time to do what he wanted to do.
Tom said that he wanted to go visit Santa Claus at the North Pole.
Tom sat next to his father and watched the football game with him.
Tom and Mary sat on a hillside and watched the fireworks together.
I hadn\'t really noticed Tom got a haircut until you mentioned it.
Why do men\'s and women\'s clothes have buttons on opposite sides?
Tom wouldn\'t mind eating meat and potatoes every day of the week.
Tom was worried that his cholesterol level might be a little high.
Tom wondered how many times Mary had been in trouble with the law.
Does Tom still think he\'s the only one here who can speak French?
Get the money ready by evening or I\'ll come back with the police.
I\'m sorry for not being more supportive when you needed me to be.
Tom doesn\'t know what to do with his money. He has so much of it.
Tom didn\'t know for certain how much the new computer would cost.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary wants him to buy her for her birthday.
Tom was positive that the camera Mary had was his, but it wasn\'t.
It\'s very important for our employees to be able to speak French.
I can\'t believe that Tom really doesn\'t want to go to Australia.
The kind of jokes you tell are very similar to the kind Tom tells.
I didn\'t even know Tom and Mary used to be married to each other.
I think Tom is the only one here who doesn\'t know how to do that.
Tom went without lunch because he didn\'t have enough time to eat.
Tom\'s happiness means more to me than anything else in the world.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told Mary he didn\'t need to do that.
Tom and Mary played in the sandbox together and made sand castles.
Tom arrived home to find that Mary had packed her things and left.
Tom can no longer afford to live in the style he is accustomed to.
As strange as it may sound, what Tom said is what really happened.
Tom\'s store sells golf clubs, balls, shoes and other accessories.
